name: 5Pieces - Small SDL Games
description:
Those are some really small and simple games I've made as I was starting to learn how to code.

5 Pieces - The story an of a small soldier that must find the 5 pieces of his armor, each piece is special and is hidden by a secret monster.

Run the GAMETEMPLATE_v2 in order to run the game.

All of the assets aside from the main character of 5 pieces were made by us.

Both games were made using SDL and C++.
